CustomField.description: This field specifies the dimensions for all rich text images inserted into your template that have both height and width of less than 500px each. Can be specified as inches (in), centimeters (cm), or pixels (px).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field specifies the dimensions for all rich text images inserted into your template that have both height and width of less than 500px each. Can be specified as inches (in), centimeters (cm), or pixels (px).
CustomField.label: MSX Rich Text Image Dimensions
